example_initialize.cpp

00001 void example_initialize(compel_script_t &script)
00002 {
00003   compel_init_t init = {0};
00004   init.b_usefullns = false;
00005 
00006   init.b_dbgout_script = true;
00007 
00008   // get all the avail extensions
00009   init.extensions = compel_script_avail_extensions();
00010 
00011   // something like this:
00012   // "binary_arith;binary_comparison;comments;crt;fileio;include;memory;scopes;shell;unconditional_branching;vars"
00013   // is returned.
00014 
00015   // initialze the script engine
00016   script = compel_script_init(&init);
00017 }
